title: Mint Coriander Chutney Recipe
directions: In a mixie or blender grind all the above ingredients to a smooth paste using little water.
Keep the Mint Coriander Chutney in an airtight container in the refrigerator.
You can Serve this Mint Coriander Chutney with pakoras, samosas, chaat, chole, potato chips or other snacks.
ingredients: 1 green chilli ( add more chillies if you want the chutney to be spicy)
salt or black salt or rock salt
